quote: Always believe in yourself. Do this and no matter where you are, you will have nothing to fear.
Life is suffering. It is hard. The world is cursed. But still, you find reasons to keep living.
Once you've met someone, you never really forget them. It just takes a while for your memories to return.
No matter how many weapons you have, no matter how great your technology might be, the world cannot live without love.
They say that the best blaze burns brightest when circumstances are at their worst.
There’s no future for people who worship the future, and forget the past.
movie: Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind - Nausicaä

quote: You cannot change fate. However, you can rise to meet it.
Trees and people used to be good friends. I saw that tree and decided to buy the house.
Smile like this. Then the scary thing disappears.
It was a dream, but it wasn't a dream!
I love Ponyo whether she's a fish, a human, or something in between.
Can you hold me in your arms?
Without even thinking about it, I used to be able to fly.
There are still a lot of things I have to discover about myself.
